headline: Home construction stocks are approaching their peak, Truist says
summary: Investing.com -- Home construction and building-products stocks have started 2026 positively, but Truist warned in a note this week that the rally looks overextended and is being driven almost entirely by political headlines rather than improving fundamentals.
